评论概述: Cute Accessory For Casual Or Play
评论详情: This cute pre-tied tie is a great accessory for casual attire or a costume. I like to wear this with my collared top for a night out on the town or to give an outfit additional jewelry. I like the heart chain on the tie and how it can be worn by a male or female. The tie is adjustable to fit all neck sizes and cleaning by hand isn't as bad as it seemed. I like my tie and that I can wear it with my everyday clothes or use it as a costume.
